author: TruthGundlach
content: Cowboys owned at home Thanksgiving.  Ravens coming to Buffalo! Two great teams, two great young QB’s. Should be on national TV.  Go Bills!!!

content: Josh Allen is getting better due to the K-Gun offense being brought back. Gives Allen the time to read the defense. Dabolll deserves credit.
